title: Pitch Black Heist
creator_credit: John Maclean, Gerardine O'Flynn, Film4, UK Film Council and DMC Film
brief_description: Liam (Liam Cunningham) and Michael (Michael Fassbender) are professional safe crackers who meet on a simple job to relieve an office safe from its contents. The catch is a light-activated alarm system.
creator_credit_for_label: John Maclean, Gerardine O’Flynn, Film4, UK Film Council and DMC Film
